arts.ttl: Metz predicted XI v Reims: Arnaud Bodart out, Pape Sy to start
arts.sum: FC Metz will be hoping for a better return from the playoffs than last season, when they host Stade de Reims tonight at the Stade Saint-Symphorien for the first leg…

arts.ttl: Reims predicted XI v Metz: Teddy Teuma sent on holiday for relegation playoffs
arts.sum: Stade de Reims have two games to maintain their place in Ligue 1 after they slipped into the relegation playoff spot on the final day of the season. Tonight, they…
